name: EspY (Lucky Hand, Starvilization, HNL2000)
description:
EspY

You're being pursued...

You have to leave.

Fortunately, whatever is after you doesn't seem to like the light very much.

Unfortunately, your lights don't seem to work while moving.

Be quick... and be careful.

Sound by https://www.youtube.com/@SirGrandPotato

FOR BETTER AUDIO QUALITY, PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE GAME.
